EmailTemplate.name: 01_16_2015 Expedient Webinar #1.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Delivering Performance in Shared Environments | Win a Quadcopter RC Drone
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Cloud Mechanics
Delivering Performance in Shared Environments Wednesday, January 28, 2015 | 12-1 p.m. EST Presented by VMTurbo and
<http://vmturbo.com/expedient-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=expedient&utm_content=011615>
Expedient Data Centers <http://www.expedient.com/>, a leader in Managed and Data Center Services with locations from Cleveland to Memphis to Boston, unpacks the mechanics of how it consistently meets Service Level Agreements for its customers. Join this webinar <http://vmturbo.com/expedient-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=expedient&utm_content=011615> and learn how service providers use VMTurbo to provide consistent performance across all workloads, as well as the three roles a responsible managed service provider (MSP) takes in order to accomplish that directive:
- Plan: assist customers in determining the most performant and efficient configuration of virtual machine resources - Operate: operate cloud infrastructure and inform customers of non-optimal configurations - Monitor: provide a consistent cloud platform for clients to have predictable and repeatable performance expectations
All registrants who attend will be entered to win a UDI U818A 2.4GHz 4 CH 6 Axis Gyro RC Quadcopter with Camera RTF Mode 2 valued at USD $129.00! Register Now <http://vmturbo.com/expedient-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=expedient&utm_content=011615> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
